mapper.select: SELECT PROCESS_INSTANCE_KEY, BPMN_PROCESS_ID, PROCESS_DEFINITION_KEY, STATE, START_DATE, END_DATE, TENANT_ID, PARENT_PROCESS_INSTANCE_KEY, PARENT_ELEMENT_INSTANCE_KEY, VERSION FROM PROCESS_INSTANCE WHERE PROCESS_INSTANCE_KEY = #{processInstanceKey}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROCESS_INSTANCE (PROCESS_INSTANCE_KEY, BPMN_PROCESS_ID, PROCESS_DEFINITION_KEY, STATE, START_DATE, END_DATE, TENANT_ID, PARENT_PROCESS_INSTANCE_KEY, PARENT_ELEMENT_INSTANCE_KEY, VERSION) VALUES (#{processInstanceKey}, #{bpmnProcessId}, #{processDefinitionKey}, #{state}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{tenantId}, #{parentProcessInstanceKey}, #{parentElementInstanceKey}, #{version})
